name: Duke Nukem 3D: Megaton Edition
description:
Duke Nukem 3D: Megaton Edition is an enhanced version of Duke Nukem 3D. It includes:

    Duke Nukem 3D: Atomic Edition
    Duke Caribbean: Life's a Beach
    Duke it out in D.C.
    Duke: Nuclear Winter

All of the games use a new engine that runs natively under contemporary operating systems with enhanced OpenGL graphics.
